price: (72) [Al-Khiḍr] said, "Did I not say that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
